QAPair.Question: What is (are) Scales ?
QAPair.Answer: Scales are a visible peeling or flaking of outer skin layers. These layers are called the stratum corneum.

QAPair.Question: What causes Scales ?
QAPair.Answer: Scales may be caused by dry skin, certain inflammatory skin conditions, or infections. Examples of disorders that can cause scales include: Eczema , Fungal infections such as ringworm or tinea versicolor , Psoriasis , Seborrheic dermatitis , Pityriasis rosea , Discoid lupus erythematosus, an autoimmune disorder , Genetic skin disorders called ichthyoses,
